abstract: Kwon Pil-ju, Korean woman who sent her son away for adoption almost 40 years ago, is waiting to welcome her son Adam Crapser, who is awaiting deportation from United States; Crapser is one of number of Korean adoptees who have returned to country after adoptions went wrong, although Crapser's case is one of more wrenching, as his citizenship papers were never filed despite having lived in US since age of three.
lead_paragraph: Kwon Pil-ju will soon be reunited with the son she gave up for adoption when he was a baby, confronting a shame she’s felt for 40 years.

headline.main: Korean Mother Awaits a Son’s Deportation to Confess Her ‘Unforgivable Sin’
